zh-cn: 国家开发银行股份有限公司

location.zh-cn: 中国北京市西城区复兴门内大街18号
location.en: 18 Fuxingmen Inner Street, Xicheng District, Beijing, China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一家开发性金融机构及政策性银行，是中国最大的债券银行、最大的对外投融资合作银行以及全球最大的政策性银行。
description.en: A development finance institution and policy bank in the People's Republic of China, it is the country's largest bond-issuing bank, largest foreign investment and financing cooperation bank, and the world's largest policy bank.

description.zh-cn: 中国金融人物，自2018年9月起担任国家开发银行董事长。
description.en: A Chinese financial figure who has served as the Chairman of China Development Bank since September 2018.

description.zh-cn: 中国金融人物，自2023年5月起担任国家开发银行行长。
description.en: A Chinese financial figure who has served as the President of China Development Bank since May 2023.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国财政部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国财政部
en: Ministry of Finance of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院组成部门，主管国家财政收支、财税政策等事务。为国家开发银行的创始机构及主要股东之一。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for national fiscal revenue and expenditure, fiscal and tax policies, etc. It is one of the founding institutions and major shareholders of China Development Bank.

nodes.id: 中央汇金投资有限责任公司

zh-cn: 中央汇金投资有限责任公司

description.zh-cn: 中国的国有投资公司，为国家开发银行的创始机构及主要股东之一。
description.en: A state-owned investment company in China, and one of the founding institutions and major shareholders of China Development Bank.

nodes.id: 梧桐树投资平台有限责任公司

zh-cn: 梧桐树投资平台有限责任公司

description.zh-cn: 国家外汇管理局旗下的投资平台，为国家开发银行的主要股东之一。
description.en: An investment platform under the State Administration of Foreign Exchange, and one of the major shareholders of China Development Bank.

nodes.id: 全国社会保障基金理事会

zh-cn: 全国社会保障基金理事会
en: National Council for Social Security Fund

description.zh-cn: 负责管理运营全国社会保障基金的机构，为国家开发银行的股东之一。
description.en: The institution responsible for managing and operating the National Social Security Fund, and a shareholder of China Development Bank.

nodes.id: 国开金融有限责任公司

zh-cn: 国开金融有限责任公司

description.zh-cn: 国家开发银行的全资子公司。
description.en: A wholly-owned subsidiary of China Development Bank.

zh-cn: 国开证券股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 国家开发银行控股的证券公司。
description.en: A securities company controlled by China Development Bank.

zh-cn: 国银金融租赁股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 国家开发银行控股的金融租赁公司。
description.en: A financial leasing company controlled by China Development Bank.

description.zh-cn: 国家开发银行首任行长。
description.en: The first President of China Development Bank.

description.zh-cn: 国家开发银行首任党组书记、副行长。
description.en: The first Party Secretary and Vice President of China Development Bank.

description.zh-cn: 1997年爆发的一场席卷亚洲多国的金融风暴。
description.en: A financial crisis that swept through many Asian countries, starting in 1997.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，陈元之父。
description.en: One of the former major leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and the father of Chen Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央银行。
description.en: The central bank of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 陈云之子，曾任中国人民银行副行长、党组副书记，后长期担任国家开发银行行长及董事长。
description.en: Son of Chen Yun, former Vice Governor and Deputy Party Secretary of the People's Bank of China, and later served as the long-term President and Chairman of China Development Bank.

description.zh-cn: 一家曾存在的中国金融机构，于1998年并入国家开发银行。
description.en: A former Chinese financial institution that was merged into China Development Bank in 1998.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一家全国性股份制商业银行。
description.en: A national joint-stock commercial bank in China.

description.zh-cn: 香港的金融管理机构，职能上相当于中央银行。
description.en: The financial regulatory authority in Hong Kong, functioning as its de facto central bank.

nodes.id: 中国银行业监督管理委员会

zh-cn: 中国银行业监督管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院前直属事业单位，负责监管中国的银行业，其职能后由国家金融监督管理总局承接。
description.en: A former institution directly under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for regulating the country's banking industry. Its functions were later taken over by the National Administration of Financial Regulation.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由国家开发银行提出的金融概念，旨在以市场化方式服务国家战略，弥补市场失灵。
description.en: A financial concept proposed by China Development Bank, aimed at serving national strategies through market-based operations to address market failures.

en: Articles of Association of China Development Bank

description.zh-cn: 规定国家开发银行组织和活动基本规则的法律文件。
description.en: The legal document that stipulates the basic rules for the organization and activities of China Development Bank.

description.zh-cn: 曾任国家开发银行行长。
description.en: Former President of China Development Bank.

description.zh-cn: 曾任国家开发银行行长。
description.en: Former President of China Development Bank.

description.zh-cn: 曾任国家开发银行行长。
description.en: Former President of China Development Bank.

description.zh-cn: 曾任国家开发银行董事长。
description.en: Former Chairman of China Development Bank.

nodes.id: 中非发展基金有限公司

zh-cn: 中非发展基金有限公司

description.zh-cn: 由国家开发银行承办，旨在支持中国企业对非投资的股权投资基金。
description.en: An equity investment fund undertaken by China Development Bank, aimed at supporting Chinese enterprises' investment in Africa.

description.zh-cn: 中国政府于2013年提出的跨国经济发展倡议。
description.en: A transnational economic development initiative proposed by the Chinese government in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府于2000年起制定的一项旨在提升西部地区经济和社会发展的政策。
description.en: A policy initiated by the government of the People's Republic of China in 2000 to promote economic and social development in its western regions.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府针对东北地区制定的经济振兴战略。
description.en: An economic revitalization strategy formulated by the government of the People's Republic of China for the Northeast region.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在“十一五”规划纲要中提出的旨在解决“三农”问题的国家战略。
description.en: A national strategy proposed in the 11th Five-Year Plan of the People's Republic of China aimed at solving the "three rural issues".

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖北省宜昌市的长江干流上的水利枢纽工程。
description.en: A hydroelectric gravity dam that spans the Yangtze River in Yichang, Hubei province, China.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国财政部

description.zh-cn: 与中央汇金投资有限责任公司共同发起设立国家开发银行，并作为其主要股东（持股36.54%）。
description.en: Co-founded China Development Bank with Central Huijin Investment Co., Ltd., and serves as one of its major shareholders (holding 36.54%).

relationships.source: 中央汇金投资有限责任公司

description.zh-cn: 与中华人民共和国财政部共同发起设立国家开发银行，并作为其主要股东（持股34.68%）。
description.en: Co-founded China Development Bank with the Ministry of Finance of the PRC, and serves as one of its major shareholders (holding 34.68%).

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 国家开发银行是直属国务院领导的政策性金融机构。
description.en: China Development Bank is a policy financial institution directly under the leadership of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 国家开发银行在金融业务上接受中国人民银行的指导和监督。
description.en: China Development Bank is subject to the guidance and supervision of the People's Bank of China in its financial operations.

description.zh-cn: 1998年12月11日，中国投资银行并入国家开发银行，其独立法人地位终结。
description.en: On December 11, 1998, China Investment Bank was merged into China Development Bank, ending its independent legal status.

description.zh-cn: 1999年3月18日，国家开发银行将原中国投资银行的资产与债务转让予中国光大银行。
description.en: On March 18, 1999, China Development Bank transferred the assets and liabilities of the former China Investment Bank to China Everbright Bank.

description.zh-cn: 向国家开发银行授予银行牌照，允许其在香港开展业务。
description.en: Granted a banking license to China Development Bank, allowing it to operate in Hong Kong.

relationships.source: 中国银行业监督管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 批准国家开发银行香港代表处升格为首家境外分行——香港分行。
description.en: Approved the upgrade of China Development Bank's Hong Kong representative office to its first overseas branch, the Hong Kong Branch.

relationships.source: 全国社会保障基金理事会

description.zh-cn: 向国家开发银行投资200亿元人民币入股。
description.en: Invested 20 billion RMB in China Development Bank for shares.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 批复国家开发银行深化改革方案，明确其开发性金融机构定位。
description.en: Approved the plan for deepening the reform of China Development Bank, clarifying its positioning as a development finance institution.

relationships.source: 梧桐树投资平台有限责任公司

description.zh-cn: 向国家开发银行注资480亿美元。
description.en: Injected US$48 billion into China Development Bank.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 国务院于2016年11月审定批准《国家开发银行章程》。
description.en: The State Council reviewed and approved the Articles of Association of China Development Bank in November 2016.

description.zh-cn: “开发性金融”是国家开发银行所提出的特有名词和金融理念。
description.en: 'Developmental finance' is a special term and financial concept proposed by China Development Bank.

relationships.source: 国开金融有限责任公司

description.zh-cn: 国家开发银行的全资子公司。
description.en: A wholly-owned subsidiary of China Development Bank.

description.zh-cn: 国家开发银行控股的证券公司，持股比例为80%。
description.en: A securities company controlled by China Development Bank, with an 80% stake.

description.zh-cn: 国家开发银行控股的金融租赁公司，持股比例为64.4%。
description.en: A financial leasing company controlled by China Development Bank, with a 64.4% stake.

relationships.source: 中非发展基金有限公司
relationships.target: 国开金融有限责任公司

description.zh-cn: 由国开金融有限责任公司持有84.99%股份。
description.en: 84.99% owned by China Development Bank Capital.

description.zh-cn: 国家开发银行是“一带一路”倡议的主要融资支持机构之一。
description.en: China Development Bank is one of the main financial supporters of the Belt and Road Initiative.

description.zh-cn: 国家开发银行向西部大开发相关的重大建设项目和基础产业提供了大量投资。
description.en: China Development Bank has provided substantial investment for major construction projects and basic industries related to the Western Development.

description.zh-cn: 国家开发银行向振兴东北相关的重大建设项目和基础产业提供了大量投资。
description.en: China Development Bank has provided substantial investment for major construction projects and basic industries related to the revitalization of Northeast China.

description.zh-cn: 国家开发银行向新农村建设提供了大量投资。
description.en: China Development Bank has provided substantial investment for the New Socialist Countryside program.

description.zh-cn: 国家开发银行向三峡水利枢纽等国家重大建设项目提供了大量投资。
description.en: China Development Bank has provided substantial investment to major national projects such as the Three Gorges Dam.
